name: Shooty Shapes (Nyo)
description:
Circles and Squares fight for dominance.

Controls: WASD to move, mouse to aim, left click to fire.

-------------------------------------------

SHOOTY SHAPES

my first unity project which took a long time to make

-------------------------------------------

As the Shape war ends, with the Triangles already being erased from existence, the Squares are forced into near extinction by the Circle Army.  You play as one of the final Squares making a last stand in the Great Shape Battlefield.

With an unlimited army at their disposal, the Circles seem impossible to defeat. However, you have something the other shapes do not.

A gun.

-------------------------------------------

This game was my first project using unity and will likely contain many bugs and errors. Nonetheless, I hope you enjoy this infinite top-down shooter. My highscore is around 20, so if you can beat that then you're probably better than me. 

Thanks!
